page.title: 06A HOUSING SURVEY
page.content:
Housing in the Acton area.
The housing type, size and ownership patterns are very mixed. Semi-detached is numerically the most important, but there are many terraced houses and flats and maisonettes in the area, plus some which are detached and some which are bungalows.
Most of the semi-detached houses are inter-war, and of mock tudor design. The terraced houses are mostly pre 1914 and are near the centre of Acton, although some are modern.
Flats and maisonettes include large pre 1914 subdivided houses and the post 1960 tower blocks of the South Acton Estate
